greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{k has exactly two bits equal to 1 in base 2} 1/k.
comment: Obviously for k > 0 in base 2 having no bit equal to 1 the sum is 0 and for 1 bit equal to 1 the sum is 2.
link: Robert Baillie, Summing The Curious Series Of Kempner and Irwin, arXiv:0806.4410 [math.CA], 2008-2015.
Wolfram Library Archive, KempnerSums.nb (8.6 KB) - Mathematica Notebook, Summing Kempner's Curious (Slowly-Convergent) Series
mathematica: (* first install irwinSums.m, see either reference, then *) First@ RealDigits@ iSum[1, 2, 2^7, 2]
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 03 2010
